document.title: Technical Bulletins: State Tax Rate on Utility Sales to Manufacturers (2012)
document.abstract: State law limits both state and local sales taxes on water, gas, electricity, and other energy sources used by manufacturers. Your city needs to ensure that your utility billing system reflects these different rates. The streamlined sales tax act is scheduled to take effect on July 1, 2013.
